## Type of change

## Checklist
- [ ] Self-reviewed the code
- [ ] Tested locally in at least one desktop and one mobile viewport
- [ ] No browser console errors/regressions
- [ ] Basic accessibility check (focus states, alt text, keyboard nav)
- [ ] No changes to licensing/attribution
